title: Babar's First Step
creator_credit: Raymond Jafelice, Clive A Smith, Patricia Loubert and Michael Hirsh
brief_description: Babar’s First Steps - Babar leads a happy and carefree life with his mother and all the other elephants in the jungle. But his life is shortened when a Hunter kills his mother and Babar must cope on his own. “City Ways” - Forced to run away from the jungle by the Hunter, Babar makes his way to the city, only to find it very dangerous and confusing. He is befriended by the Old Lady, who tries to teach him how to fit into her world. Rated: G
